titleStmt.title: An answer to A letter to Dr. Sherlock written in vindication of that part of Josephus's history which gives the account of Jaddus's submission to Alexander against the answer to the piece entituled, Obedience and submission to the present government / by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Wagstaffe, Thomas, 1645-1712.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
